Since 2015, we have expanded our shared hosting activities to the general public. Since we have also gained experience in dedicated servers through our activities in the hosting of teamspeak servers, we also extended our sector of activity in the VPS hosting.

We have always been dedicated to price-quality ratio and our main goal is to provide quality services for those on a low budget. We believe that the web should remain cheap and accessible to everyones. It is really important for us that our customers do not feel as if they are just a number.

DDoS Protection
Free DDOS protection on all shared web hosting packages! We offer protection for bandwidth and packet intensive attacks designed to take your website offline by flooding it with more traffic than it can handle. We use multiple layers of identification and filtering hardware and services to help ensure your website remains online during these DDoS attacks. Types of attacks covered are UDP Floods, NTP Amplification, DNS Amplification, Syn Flood, Volume Based Attacks, Fragmented Packet Attacks.
